summary: Skarvor, A Veteran of war with the scars to prove it. After mastering the art of combat Skarvor's ambitions are to slay the mighty dragon "Alduin" and after hearing about the return of the Dragonborn his ambition might soon come true.
descriptionHtml:
Skarvor, A Veteran of war with the scars to prove it. After mastering the art of combat Skarvor's ambitions are to slay the mighty dragon "Alduin" and after hearing about the return of the Dragonborn his ambition might soon come true. He is waiting near the Skyforge for you; The Dragonborn to lead him into battle.
Skarvor comes equipped with an extremely powerful Greatsword crafted by the Gods, Daedric Armor crafted with his bare hands and a heart for combat.

This is my first mod created with the Creation Kit and would appreciate any Feedback on the mod and suggestions on how i can improve and what i could do for my next mod.

This mod is also available on the Skyrim Steam Workshop here: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=290842252
author: TheDoominator
